document_data.name: Methegrist
document_data.mainbody: '''Methegrist''' was a fortress in the [[Moonwood]] that served as the headquarters of the [[Moonwatchers]], a small group of [[paladin]]s devoted to [[Helm]] who had appointed themselves defenders of the [[Moonlands]]. The fortress was a ruin as of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The [[imp]] [[Fortenesti]] infiltrated the Moonwatchers and caused them to turn on each other. The Moonwatchers fractured and Methegrist fell into ruin.
document_data.Inhabitants: * [[Jahar]], the first paladin to succumb to manipulation, still haunted Methegrist as of the 15{{th}} century DR.
